title: We Love Nicki Minaj
itunes:title: We Love Nicki Minaj
description:
Today on the show they discussed Nicki Minaj going off on Joe Budden and even  brought Charlamagne and DJ Envy in the conversation about leading the hate train against her when they were suppose to be friends, but they denied these claims and went to Breakfast Club Court on "Who Loves Nicki Minaj More". Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to another Florida Man who pulled a gun on two delivery men, because his furniture was late and tells them 'he's shot for less'. Also, we had black entrepreneur and designer Devlin Carter stop by, where he spoke about his shoe designs, companies stealing his designs and more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show they discussed Nicki Minaj going off on Joe Budden and even  brought Charlamagne and DJ Envy in the conversation about leading the hate train against her when they were suppose to be friends, but they denied these claims and went to Breakfast Club Court on "Who Loves Nicki Minaj More". Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to another Florida Man who pulled a gun on two delivery men, because his furniture was late and tells them 'he's shot for less'.
